examples:
QUERY (\x xs -> x:xs)
 FROM locations
 AS relational
 TO relational
 RETURN all

QUERY (\x xs -> x:xs)
 FROM orders
 AS tree
 TO tree
 RETURN all

LET t BE
QUERY (\x xs -> if orderNumber x == "3qqqeq9" then (orderProducts x) ++ xs else xs)
FROM orders
AS tree
TO relational
RETURN all
IN
QUERY (\x xs -> if productPrice x > 50 then x:xs else xs)
FROM t
AS relational
TO relational
 RETURN all

QUERY (\x -> Vertex x)
 FROM customers
 AS graph
 TO graph
 RETURN all

LET t BE
 QUERY (\x -> if customerName x == "Alice" then [x] else [])
 FROM customers
 AS graph
 TO relational
 RETURN all
 IN
 QUERY (\x -> if any (\y -> knows x y customers) t then Vertex x else empty)
 FROM customers
 AS graph
 TO graph
 RETURN all

LET t BE
QUERY (\x -> if customerId x == 6 then [x] else [])
FROM customers
AS graph
TO relational
RETURN all
IN
LET k BE
QUERY (\x -> if any (\y -> knows x y customers) t then [x] else [])
FROM customers
AS graph
TO relational
RETURN all
IN
QUERY (\x xs -> if creditLimit x > 1000 then x:xs else xs)
FROM k
AS relational
TO relational
RETURN all

QUERY (\x -> [(customerName x, countryName(located x locations))])
FROM customers
AS graph
TO relational
RETURN all

QUERY (\x -> if creditLimit x > 500 then Vertex (customerName x, cityName (located x locations)) else empty)
FROM customers
AS graph
TO graph
 RETURN all

LET t BE
QUERY (\x -> if customerName x == "John" then [x] else [])
FROM customers
AS graph
TO relational
RETURN all
IN
QUERY (\x -> if reachable x (t !! 0) customers then Vertex x else empty)
FROM customers
AS graph
TO graph
RETURN all

LET t BE
 QUERY (\x xs -> if elem "Carpet" (map productName (orderProducts x)) then x:xs else xs)
 FROM orders
 AS tree
 TO relational
 RETURN all
IN
 QUERY (\x -> if any (\y -> ordered y customers == x ) t then Vertex x else empty)
 FROM customers
 AS graph
 TO graph
 RETURN all

LET t BE
 QUERY (\x -> if customerId x == 6 then [x] else [])
 FROM customers
 AS graph
 TO relational
 RETURN all
 IN
 LET k BE
 QUERY (\x -> if any (\y -> knows x y customers) t then [x] else [])
 FROM customers
 AS graph
 TO relational
 RETURN all
 IN
 LET h BE
 QUERY (\x -> if any (\y -> knows x y customers) k then [x] else [])
 FROM customers
 AS graph
 TO relational
 RETURN all
 IN
 LET r BE
 QUERY (\x xs -> if any (\y -> ordered x customers == y ) h then x:xs else xs)
 FROM orders
 AS tree
 TO relational
 RETURN all
 IN
 QUERY (\x xs -> if ((sum $ map productPrice (orderProducts x)) > 5000) then x:xs else xs)
 FROM r
 AS relational
 TO tree
 RETURN all

QUERY (\x xs -> (orderNumber x, customerName(ordered x customers), countryName(located(ordered x customers) locations)):xs)
FROM orders
AS tree
TO relational
RETURN all

LET t BE
QUERY (\x xs -> if ((sum $ map productPrice (orderProducts x)) > 100) then x:xs else xs)
FROM orders
AS tree
TO tree
RETURN all
IN
QUERY (\x xs -> (orderNumber x, customerName(ordered x customers), countryName(located(ordered x customers) locations)):xs)
FROM t
AS tree
TO relational
RETURN all
